articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Volkswagen, BMW fined $1 billion for colluding to make dirtier cars - The Verge
articles.description: German automakers spent years holding secret meetings where they agreed to slow the deployment of clean car technology. This anti-competitive behavior resulted in new fines from the European Union, which has been investigating the allegations for four years.
articles.content:
Mercedes-Benz parent company Daimler was involved, too, but it blew the whistle
